pages.text: $(item)Magma Blocks$() damage most living entities standing on top of them, even if underwater. $(br2)The $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() can avoid all damage by sneaking, being under the $(l:brewing/effect#fire_resistance)$(thing)Fire Resistance$() effect, or by wearing $(l:enchanting/enchantments#frost_walker)$(thing)Frost Walker$() $(item)Boots$().
